features: DESK & BOOKSHELF TWO-IN-ONE: Its vertical design features a open bookshelf and attached a hutch saves floor space while enhancing storage options. And even with all your stuffs it still feels spacious!
COMPACT BUT HUGE ENOUGH FOR 2 MONITORS: This extra large desk surface (47.2in*23.6in) with high capacity makes it perfect fit for your laptop or desktop PC and all of your office accessories.

[SUPER STURDY AND DURABLE]: The desk legs made from heavy-duty metal ( 1.18" by 1.18" width) which offers super stability and durability, 0.6" thicker desktop is strong enough support heavy duty load. The Panel material is environmental E1 standard particle wood which is wear-resistant, heat-resistant and easy to clean.
EASY TO ASSEMBLE: It will took 20 minutes to put together for most people with assembly instruction help. Don't worry about the Installation , it’s easy for you!
We believe in our products, and are here to make you house awesome! If you aren't fully satisfied with our products, you can just contact us
body.description: PRODUCT FEATURE The Triblesigns Desk and hutch brings together all of the features you need for a functional, dependable desk for your home. Extra Large work surface provide enough room for wok or study The hutch and book shelf makes it has high capacity without mess Sturdy metal frame makes it more stable Safety round desk edges design protect your body The adjustable leg pads, made the desks keep stable even on uneven floor

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy Assembly & Perfect - A Desk for Increasing Space
reviews.reviewText: The one thing I really didn't appreciate about this desk was the screwdriver that was provided to put it together. Used a allen key screwdriver combo I had on-hand from something else I put together not too long ago- it really came in handy and made this a breeze to put together. The instruction diagrams were easy to follow, although they were kinda confusing in spots where it was indicating the screws behind or under a couple of sections.The top shelf was the most difficult part for me- due to the screws for the dividers...I mean they do fit and fasten....they just didn't want to lol- felt like they weren't meant to go under there and they don't fit flush to the surface so I questioned myself as I was following the picture... rest assured though, they do fit. It took a couple of hours to put it together by myself mostly cuz I was doing other things and I had a super small area to construct it in.The price is phenomenal compared to many other prices I've found online for desks with bookshelves or hutches. It's sturdy and does hold weight well. Mine was chipped on the front edge of the table but I attribute that to an evil delivery dude and, later on, my dad who thought it was his package and basically destroyed the box =_=### it'll just be its dimple...thinking of covering it with a sticker tomorrow.It's a very roomy feeling desk and I'm getting all happy thinking of reading, writing letters, doing my digital/traditional art (ohuhu brush markers are phenomenal btw but you proli couldn't care less about that right now 😅), and studying ...Overall it's pretty awesome and just looks amazing. Small enough to fit into my little room but big enough to house everything I need it to as well. True to the measurements. The top shelf is below eye level for a 5'3" person- it's shorter than I thought it would be, but that was honestly a pleasant discovery in my case. Super happy I didn't pass this one up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this desk. I bought it to place in my bedroom since my husband uses the office for his desk setup (we’re both students). I love that it has a shelf at top and also on the bottom part. Very easy to put together, it took my husband maybe 30 mins. Sturdy, looks exactly like photos. I don’t have a PC setup, just a laptop but there’s plenty of room for my books notebooks and laptop

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This desk is both stylish and functional. I use the shelves for holding plants some of my favorite books. My cats love to run on it and nothing topples over! 10/10 would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2020
reviews.reviewText: TLDR: You need to understand "build-by-image". The build quality is great. It's durable; sturdy, but has a little wobble to it. Is good size, and has room for books / trinkets underneath and above the main desk area. Would recommend.If you are not familiar with building furniture by an image (like ikea), I'd advise you find a friend who is to help you. This desk's build instructions are laid out in 4 steps by image. There are some numerical errors on the pieces themselves, you will need to identify a few pieces by the image steps. There are 14 desk pieces to assemble, with hardware and a tool included, but I would have a Phillips-head screwdriver handy to make the build a little easier. You will need 30-60 minutes to build this desk with a friend.When you finally have the desk built, it's a good size. Perfect for a teenager or adult. It has a wobble to it, even with the height adjusters on the legs. I don't think it would fall over but if you bump into it, but you have small trinkets on the top, they will move and/or fall off. The under desk shelf doesn't have an edge to stop books from falling to the side if you will be storing books there as advertised. We placed a book set on the edge to resolve this small issue.The desk piece itself had a minimal chip on the right side (not visible after build), likely due to shipping. Our package had a large tear that was taped back together during shipment. We didn't find the imperfection bad enough to return as the desk as it was not visible, and the desk will withstand a bit of wear in its lifetime.Desk quality is good. All pieces are completely finished on all sides, not like others with non-visible sides showing the particle board construction, which personally I didn't expect at this price range. This also means that durability is going to be good over time, and a spill here or there isn't going to ruin this piece.Shipment was very fast considering the expected delivery was still 1.5 weeks away when it arrived.Easy to assemble (4-stars): For some errors in the guide, otherwise the build was straight-forward.Sturdiness (4-stars): Has a little wobble to it if you bump into the deskValue for money (5-stars): Finished pieces on all sides, uncommon at this price range. Good size desk with lots of open storage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Phenomenal Product : Beautiful and Easy To Put Together
reviews.reviewText: What a gorgeous desk. I’ve just been staring at it for about an hour now. As a note, the instruction manual does not come in the box but rather, I’d provided as link on this Amazon product page. So no need to fear when you do not see one. This desk is incredibly easy to assemble. I did it on my own and it took about an hour. I think if you’re custom to building furniture it’ll come easier to you. Once fully built, the desk is everything I wanted and then some. The 3D model was accurate in displaying what it would look like in your space so all around, excellent product experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is standard quality for a faux wood based work surface. Once assembled, which was very straight forward, the desk is sturdy. Fits well in my child's bedroom. Not too big. Not too small.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This desk is an excellent buy. It’s sturdy and a good size. I like that there are shelves as well. This does not look like a $171 desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A solid and well designed desk
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy desk with plenty of space for your items. It is well-designed and looks nice in the room.

This is very nice and sleek design, pleasant look, nice placement for books and desk items, easy to move and clean under the table. Assembly feedback to engineers: Assembly is pretty easy if you provide simple steps it is easy to start assembling it by non-technical people, it is more info provided that is confusing. holes of Parts 2 and 3 connecting are not matching with part1 holes ; Part 9 (plank) does not have holes to fix with side frame. I have to use drilling machine to make holes. Allen key and required screws are quite Good quality and excess one set of Screws and fittings provided, appreciated. After complete assembly I found table is sturdy and quite easy to move by my daughter;Easy Assembly tips: First assemble table legs and with bottom books rack, rectangle iron frame and top working area plank (#6). Secondly, Assemble top rack (1,2,3,4) with legs and mount entire top rack on top of already assembled table. Overall I felt value for money and decent purchase.

Positive points:Good product and very specious. Nicely designed.Packing is also good. Feel good while studying, using Laptop, practicing Chess.Negative points:Top Book shelf got bend down after keeping few books in the middle. (They should have given support to middle part of top shelf)Particle wood is ok type not that good (saw some fungal dust at few places)It's not easy to assemble, we asked the carpenter, (but it's one-time-activity).Edges are little-bit sharp.Apart from that rest is Good.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not worth the money. Poor Quality Paint Job!
reviews.reviewText: The installation instructions were not very clear took forever to figure it out. Setup required Allen wrench and a screwdriver. However, screwdriver was not provided. The seller didn't even provide enough screws so had to visit hardware shop to buy more.After hours of struggle with setup, I realised that the paint job on the metal frame was poor quality and had already started falling off.I tried contacting Amazon and seller to get partial refund but failed. DEFINITELY NOT WORTH RS. 8000!

reviews.reviewTitle: Amazing product but very tricky to assemble
reviews.reviewText: I tried on my own.. but eventually had to take help.. 2 people took 1:30 hr to assemble the table.. Also, few holes were not aligned properly.. i had to drill few holes by drill machine.. Otherwise the table is very sturdy, very durable.. Awesome premium looking table.. Paisa Vasool

I (and my family members) recently purchased the Computer Desk with high hopes of creating a functional and stylish workspace. While the desk itself has potential, I must admit that my overall experience with its assembly was quite disappointing.To begin with, the assembly process turned out to be far more complicated and time-consuming than I anticipated. The instructions provided were not as clear as I had hoped, and I found myself struggling to identify the proper alignment for certain components.What particularly dampened my enthusiasm was the considerable amount of time I had to invest in putting together the desk. Assembling furniture is not a new endeavor for me, but this desk took an unexpectedly long time to assemble, which was a major inconvenience given my busy schedule.I spent hours meticulously following the instructions and attempting to decipher unclear illustrations, only to realize that I was still far from completing the desk.On the positive side, once I managed to successfully assemble the desk, it did offer a spacious and appealing workspace. The desk’s design is sleek, and the materials used appear to be of decent quality. However, the satisfaction I derived from the final result was overshadowed by the frustration and time spent during the assembly process.In conclusion, while the Computer Desk has potential to be a functional and stylish addition to any workspace, the assembly experience was far from satisfactory. The lack of clear instructions, combined with the extended time required for assembly, left me feeling quite disappointed. If the manufacturer could address these issues and improve the user-friendly nature of the assembly process, this desk could become a much more appealing option for those seeking a convenient and efficient home office solution.
